name: Barrett Business Services, Inc.
description: Barrett Business Services, Inc. (BBSI) is a provider of business management solutions and professional employer organization (PEO) services. Founded in 1964 and headquartered in Vancouver, Washington, BBSI specializes in offering a comprehensive suite of services designed to help small to medium-sized businesses streamline their operations and reduce administrative burdens. The company provides services such as payroll processing, employee benefits, risk management, and human resource consulting. BBSI's unique approach integrates workforce management with a focus on employee safety and compliance, enabling clients to enhance productivity and improve workplace environments. The company has established a strong reputation for its commitment to delivering personalized, high-quality service and is dedicated to fostering long-term partnerships with its clients. Through its innovative business model, BBSI allows clients to focus on their core operations while entrusting the complexities of HR and compliance to experienced professionals. In addition to its PEO services, Barrett Business Services also offers staffing solutions, helping businesses find and retain talent in a competitive job market. BBSI is poised for growth as it continues to expand its offerings and adapt to the evolving needs of the workforce management sector.

seo.meta_title: Barrett Business Services, Inc. | Business Management Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Barrett Business Services, Inc. (BBSI), a leader in providing business management and PEO services designed to help businesses thrive. Discover our comprehensive solutions.

faq.question: What services does BBSI offer?
faq.answer: BBSI offers PEO services, payroll processing, employee benefits, risk management, and staffing solutions.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of BBSI?
faq.answer: Michael E. O'Connor is the CEO of Barrett Business Services, Inc.

faq.question: Where is BBSI headquartered?
faq.answer: BBSI is headquartered in Vancouver, Washington, USA.
